sentences.en: ...indications that there would be no draconian measures to lower U.S. health care costs.
sentences.cn: …迹象表明将不会有严厉的措施来降低美国的医疗成本。

sentences.en: But Superfund's draconian liability rules offend any common - sense notion of justice.
sentences.cn: 但超巨额基金所规定的严厉措施是同尽人皆知的公正观念相违背的.

sentences.en: Kapak Lands : Many surviving kapaks have joined their brethren in the draconian nation in Teyr.
sentences.cn: 卡帕克龙人的领地: 许多仍然生存的卡帕克龙人加入了他们的同胞在提尔的龙人国度.

sentences.en: Lateness will be penalized a draconian fashion.
sentences.cn: 迟到将以严厉方式处罚.

sentences.en: Let us keep at our efforts to abolish the draconian ISA.
sentences.cn: 让我们继续斗争以废除残酷的内安法令.

sentences.en: O, Draconian devil! Oh, lame saint!
sentences.cn: 啊, 严酷的魔王! 噢, 瘸腿的圣徒!

sentences.en: That's the reason for the increasingly nasty and draconian measures now used to enforce software copyright.
sentences.cn: 正是这个原因,现在有越来越险恶和严厉的措施被用来强化软件版权.

sentences.en: The legal limits on personal expression are draconian, but not very often invoked.
sentences.cn: 法律上对自由的限制是严苛的, 但很少被真正实施.

sentences.en: There has been an overall growth in population, despite some draconian efforts to contain it.
sentences.cn: 尽管有严厉的遏制措施,人口还是在全面增长.

sentences.en: This is the only sensible solution to the problem besides removing the draconian ban.
sentences.cn: 除了去掉这项严格的禁令外,这是唯一明智的解决方法.

sentences.en: Whether accurate or not, the correction itself should make any draconian measures less likely.
sentences.cn: 无论传言准确与否, 股价回落本身,应足以降低出台激烈措施的可能性.
